summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General voluntary interview form used to document warnings and assurances given to an employee being asked to provide information as part of an investigation. It includes a waiver section for the employee to sign, indicating their understanding and willingness to participate voluntarily.
keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview form from the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General.
The form provides warnings and assurances to an employee being asked to provide information voluntarily as part of an investigation.
The investigation is conducted under the Inspector General Act of 1978, as amended.
The form states that no disciplinary action will be taken if the employee chooses not to answer questions.
The form includes a waiver section for the employee to sign, acknowledging understanding and voluntary participation.
